DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect mixed herb spice gene expression pathway associate glucose homeostasis , oxidative stress , inflammation interrelation circulate miRNA , postprandial phase healthy human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Effects Mixed Herbs Spices Pathways Associated With Glucose Homeostasis Inflammation PBMCs Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female BMI 2333 kg/m2 Must able accept spice Agreed sign informed consent Below 18 year old Uncomfortable speak English and/or difficulty understand spoken English Smoking use snuss Vegetarian vegan Having food allergy Stressed venous blood sample previous experience difficult cannulate Receiving drug treatment may influence study outcomes Pregnancy breastfeed
